text: Rio Verde Esporte Clube, commonly known as Rio Verde, is a Brazilian football team based in Rio Verde de Mato Grosso, Mato Grosso do Sul state. ==History== The club was founded on December 17, 1991. Rio Verde won the Campeonato Sul- Mato-Grossense Second Level in 2004. ==Achievements== * Campeonato Sul-Mato- Grossense Second Level: ** Winners (1): 2004 ==Stadium== Rio Verde Esporte Clube play their home games at Estádio Cezário Balbino de Freitas. The stadium has a maximum capacity of 3,000 people. ==References== Category:Association football clubs established in 1991 Category:Football clubs in Mato Grosso do Sul Category:1991 establishments in Brazil
title: Rio Verde Esporte Clube
